name: Some Card and Board Game Complete!
name_original: Some Card and Board Game Complete!
description:
This game is my inspiration to making Computer Games!

This is the Complete Version of the game since I didn't have enough time to Create this Game.

How To Play:

The Goal is to win 30 Points with your Cards while moving your tower piece through out the Board!

Press R in the Keyboard To Roll the Dice

Tiles:

Grey Tile: Just Some Normal Average Tile ;)

Green Get Tile: This Tile Gives the User or Bot an Random Additional Card from an "Invisible" Stack.

Blue Get Tile: This Tile "Automatically" Gives You or the Bot a Card from the Other User. (Still Developing on How the User Can Choose a card from the Bot)

Red Discard Tile: This Tile Gives the User a Choice to what Card he would Discard.

Orange Change Tile: This Tile Switches the User and Bot's Cards to each Other.

Cyan Reverse Tile: This Tile Reverses the Movement or Encirclement of the Board from either Clockwise or Counter-Clockwise

Purple Backwards Tile: This Tile Moves the Tower that lands on it Backwards with a set amount of times rolled from the Dice.

Whiter-Red Get-3 Tile: This Tile Gives 3 Random Cards from the other Player. If the other Player has 3 cards less, then the other player will lose all of his Cards.

Pink Stop Tile: This Tile Stops the next Player/Bot.

Yellow 1+Life Tile: (Still in Development).

Yellow-Green Switch Tile: This Tile Switches the User and the Bot's Towers.

Win Tile: Lets the Player/Bot Win.

Lose Tile: Lets the Player/Bot Lose.
